name: Potatoes and Tomatoes In Mustard Dressing
keywords: potato, tomato, whole-grain mustard, side dish, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 9 ounces tiny new potatoes, scrubbed but not peeled
6 ounces ripe tomatoes, yellow or red, any size or shape
1 tablespoon corn, safflower or canola oil

recipeInstructions.text: Cook potatoes in water to cover in covered pot until they are tender, 10 to 20 minutes depending on size. Drain and cool to room temperature.
Wash and dry tomatoes; cut into bite-size chunks.
In serving bowl, whisk oil and vinegar and beat in mustard and brown sugar.
Combine potatoes and tomatoes and stir gently into dressing.
